Function overview

  1. Odefy main
  2. Model creation
  3. Analysis of Boolean models
  4. Simulation-related functions
  5. Model exporting
  6. CellNetAnalyzer
  7. Miscellaneous
<< Back to main page

The following tables show a list of all Odefy functions along with short descriptions. For detailed instructions please refer to the help pages of the respective functions by calling help [function].

Odefy main

InitOdefyInitialize Odefy, set paths and load Java classes
AboutOdefyShow Odefy version information
OdefyHelpDisplay Odefy HTML help

Model creation

ExpressionsToOdefyCreate an Odefy Boolean model from a set of Boolean formulas
yEdToOdefyConvert graph from yEd graphml file to an Odefy model
BNPBNToOdefyConvert PBN toolbox model to Odefy model
LoadModelMATLoad Odefy model or simulation structure from MATLAB .mat file
LoadModelFileLoad Odefy model from MATLAB .mat file, yEd graph file, GINsim GINML file or a text file containing Boolean equations
GraphToOdefyConvert conventional graphs (represented as adjacency matrices) into Boolean models by automatic rule generation
MultiModelTurn normal model into multi-compartment model (see also: link)

Analysis of Boolean models

BooleanStatesCalculate Boolean steady states and the state-transition graph
PrettyPrintStatesPrint Boolean states in human-readable form

Simulation-related functions

SimulateShow graphical user interface for simulations
CreateSimstructCreate simulation structure with default values (see also: link)
SetInitialValueChange initial value of certain species in simulation structure
SetParametersChange parameters of dynamic model in simulation structure
DefaultParametersGenerate set of default parameters for a given model
ParameterVectorConvert parameter structure to ODE-script compatible parameter vector
OdefySimulationPerform Boolean or dynamic simulation using given simulation structure
OdefyPhasePlaneDraw phase-plane view of multiple time-course trajectories
PhasePlanePhase-plane function suitable for generic ODE script files

Model exporting

ExportShow graphical user interface for model exporting
SaveModelMATSave Odefy model or simulation structure as MATLAB .mat file
SaveGNAModelSave Odefy model as GNA model
SaveSQUADModelSave Odefy model as SQUAD model
CreateBNPBNModelConvert Odefy model to PBN toolbox format
SaveMatlabODEExport Odefy model to a MATLAB script file compatible with common numerical ODE solvers
SaveSBMLSave ODE-transformed Odefy model in SBML format
SaveRModelExport Odefy model to an ODE R-script
CreateSBToolboxModelConvert ODE-transformed ODE to SBToolbox model

CellNetAnalyzer

CNAInstallInstalls Odefy as a CellNetAnalyzer plugin for a currently opened network
CNAToOdefyConvert CellNetAnalyzer model to Odefy model

Miscellaneous

IsMatlabChecks whether the environment is MATLAB or Octave
IsXMLDetermines whether a file is an XML file
IsOdefyModelChecks whether a variable contains a valid Odefy model
IsGINMLDetermines whether a file is a GINsim GINML file


Odefy by CMB, http://cmb.helmholtz-muenchen.de/odefy
